DOC.detailed_description: This study involve 2-week `` run-in '' period two 4-week `` intervention '' phase separate 3 week `` washout '' non-intervention phase ( total 13 week ) . At start 4-week intervention period , subject ask participate `` postprandial challenge '' test . Subjects ask first follow 2-week run-in control period consume habitual diet refrain consume polyphenol-rich foods/beverages , include tea , berry , grape , juice , wine . Subjects ask consume 60 g grape powder placebo random order , 4-week intervention period , separate 3-week washout period . Subjects ask prepare powder mixing water breakfast ( 30 g ) dinner ( 30 g ) consume immediately mix ( within 30 minute ) . During 4-week intervention period , subject ask refrain consume polyphenol-rich foods/beverages . During washout period subject ask consume powder , abstain consume polyphenol-rich foods/beverages . The grape powder make composite fresh red , green black California grape , base actual consumption pattern consumer . It mix seed seedless variety freeze , ground food-quality dry ice , freeze-dried , re-ground . Subjects also ask maintain normal diet exercise habit throughout study , exception consumption polyphenol-rich foods/beverages . Subjects ask complete 5-day dietary record ( include 1 weekend day ) 7-day physical activity diary baseline end intervention period . Subjects come University Connecticut Nutrition Department every week ( biweekly ) pick powder ( packet ) , need kept frozen consumption . For postprandial challenge test , subject ask fast overnight ( 12 hour ) give coconut oil-based lactose-free milkshake ( 1 g fat/kg body weight ) , contain 60 g either placebo grape powder . Subjects ask spend test day laboratory rest state , exception water , permit consume additional food beverage 6 hour consume milkshake . Subjects ask abstain alcohol strenuous physical activity 24-hours prior postprandial test . To standardize short-term fat intake , subject give recipe instruct consume low-fat evening meal ( < 10 g fat ) night prior postprandial test . Subjects also ask complete 1-day food record day prior postprandial test .
